text: Now You See Me is a 2013 American caper thriller movie. It was produced by Bobby Cohen, Alex Kurtzman, and Roberto Orci. The movie was directed by Louis Leterrier. Now You See Me was released on May 31, 2013 in North America and on July 31, 2013 in France. The movie gained mixed reviews from critics and hold a 50% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. The movie was a box-office success and gained a sequel. == Cast == * Jesse Eisenberg as J. Daniel Atlas * Mark Ruffalo as Dylan Rhodes * Woody Harrelson as Merritt McKinney * Isla Fisher as Henley Reeves * Dave Franco as Jack Wilder * Mélanie Laurent as Alma Dray * Morgan Freeman as Thaddeus Bradley * Michael Caine as Arthur Tressler * Michael Kelly as Agent Fuller * Common as Agent Evans * José Garcia as Étienne Forcier * Elias Koteas as Lionel Shrike (uncredited) ==References== == Other websites == *Official website * Category:2013 crime movies Category:2013 thriller movies Category:2010s mystery movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:English-language movies Category:French crime movies Category:French thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Louis Leterrier Category:Movies set in Las Vegas Category:Movies set in Louisiana Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Paris
title: Now You See Me (movie)
